item.title: DNS Dynamic Updates With DNSMasq on Ubiquiti ER-X
item.description: I had previously spun up DNS and DHCP on a CentOS 7 VM, but I’m currently blowing out my entire environment to migrate to oVirt. Plus, I’ve since gotten a Ubiquiti Edgerouter X, which is a mighty capable device. The default DHCP server is ISC dhcpd, and the configuration doesn’t update DNS entries (or at least not reliably), so I chose to use dnsmasq Prerequisites I never turned on the DHCP server, but you’ll have to turn it off.
